name: Miso-Agave Mayonnaise (Vegan)
description: A sweet and salty vegan mayonnaise made with miso, agave nectar, and tofu.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine tofu, miso paste, agave nectar, and rice vinegar in a blender or food processor and blend on high speed until completely smooth. Slowly drizzle in oil until s stable emulsion forms. Transfer to a sealed container and refrigerate until well chilled. Miso mayonnaise will last for up to 2 weeks in refrigerator.
